synopsis.text: Japanese horror manga artist Junji Ito's chilling tales come to life in the animated series "Ito Junji: Collection." Each episode of this anthology series features two standalone stories, showcasing a variety of protagonists, including the infamous Tomie, Soichi, and Fuchi. The series explores terrifying mysteries that lurk in both broad daylight and the darkest corners of the night. From a cursed jade carving that inflicts its victims with gruesome holes, to a hauntingly beautiful spirit that bestows cursed counsel at a foggy crossroads, these stories will leave you on the edge of your seat. Be warned: the unsettling supernatural tales in this collection are not for the faint of heart. Brace yourself for an unnerving experience as these traumatizing stories unfold.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
